derivation: from the base of G939 (βέβηλος) and (a threshold);
strongs_def: accessible (as by crossing the door-way), i.e. (by implication, of Jewish notions) heathenish, wicked
outline:
1. accessible, lawful to be trodden
    1. of places
  2. profane
    1. unhallowed, common, public place
    2. of men, ungodly
